The quality prints that Image Communications turns out is unmatched! I know it's a bold statement but in my experience it's absolutely true. He can steer you in the right direction and knows what materials work best for each application, whether it be large format prints for in-store decor or trade show graphics. Not only does his company do great printing, he's not a bad guy either! He is extremely pleasant to me, as well as my clients I introduce him to. I haven't tried out all the services Richard's company offers but I'm looking for excuses too!
